name: azure-maya-mystery
description: Discover the secrets of the pyramid!

scripts.postbuild: mkdir ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureMayaMystery && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/assets* ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureMayaMystery/assets && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/fonts* ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureMayaMystery/fonts && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/images* ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureMayaMystery/images && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/pyramid* ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureMayaMystery/pyramid && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/404.html ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureMayaMystery/404.html && cp -rf ./game/.vuepress/dist/index.html ./game/.vuepress/dist/AzureMayaMystery/index.html

author: softchris,jlooper
